title: Traveling to hometown in Ramadan, can I Shorten prayers and skip Fasting? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: the second question was that he's going from Saudi Arabia to mumbay and then from Mumbai to Delhi his hometown is Delhi so once he leaves Saudi Arabia is he allowed to shorten prayers and skip fasting the answer is yes the moment you fly away ya know you're airborne then you may shorten prayers skip fasting until you reach your hometown so if you go to Dubai if you go to mumbay if you go to any other destination you're still a traveler the moment you set foot in your hometown which is Delhi then you cannot shorten nor skip Ramadan and Allah knows best
